content.rendered: [vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1620523755145{background-image: url(https://sdbi.in/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Webp.net-resizeimage.jpg?id=16903) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”16439″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”INTERNATIONAL ACADEMIC COLLABORATIONS” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]School of Data Science and Business Intelligence in association with the prestigious University of Nicosia have taken up an initiative in shaping the talent capability aligned to data analysis and business requirements to accrue seamless mutual benefits for the world of academics and industry. The objective of this course is to contribute to overall development of the student in order to enhance quality and consistency by channelizing practical industry knowledge to the classroom.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”ABOUT UNIC” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23df3735|line_height:2″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1621232982040{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621232230591{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]The University of Nicosia is the largest university in Cyprus. It was established in 1980 and its main campus is located in Nicosia, the capital city of Cyprus that teaches primarily in English. UNIC has been investing in developing programmes, including with partner universities, focusing on global careers, building research capabilities in areas relating to the 4th industrial revolution, and improving the student experience both on-campus and online.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1621232962762{margin-top: 0% !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1621232998471{margin-top: 0% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”16940″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1621233056451{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16941″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1621233100765{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16942″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1621233093572{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621233254604{padding-top: 6% !important;}”]Largest University in Southern Europe that teaches primarily in English welcoming 12,500+ students from over 120 countries across the globe.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621233269418{padding-top: 6% !important;}”]Ranked 76th Best University in the world the Times Higher Education (THE) World University Rankings[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1621233306887{padding-top: 6% !important;}”]#1 in the world for Blockchain and Digital Currency.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”COURSES OFFERED UNDER THIS COLLABORATION” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”12px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”1. BACHELORS IN DATA SCIENCE AND BUSINESS ANALYTICS (2+2)” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]2 years at Patkar Varde College, SDBI, University of Mumbai + 2 years at University of Nicosia, Cyprus (UNIC) campus[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Read More” style=”outline” color=”danger” size=”sm” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fbachelors-in-data-science-and-business-analytics-22%2F|title:BACHELORS%20IN%20DATA%20SCIENCE%20AND%20BUSINESS%20ANALYTICS”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”2. MASTERS IN DATA SCIENCE AND BUSINESS ANALYTICS (1+2)” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]1 semester at Patkar Varde College, SDBI, University of Mumbai + 2 semesters at University of Nicosia, Cyprus (UNIC) campus[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Read More” style=”outline” color=”danger” size=”sm” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fmasters-in-data-science-and-business-analytics-2%2F|title:MASTERS%20IN%20DATA%20SCIENCE%20AND%20BUSINESS%20ANALYTICS”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
